attributes.action: Remove the option from schools choice to have RE as compulsory so it's a choice
attributes.additional_details:
Example; you choose Spanish as a language
                  You choose art and DT.   You then can't pick IT so you can go into engineering.

PCRE-personal career religious education
attributes.background: Not everyone needs to study RE. In some schools where it is compulsory pupils miss out on subjects they need to go down a certain career path.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like taken.
